entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
